entry.title: Testing commits
entry.summary: The author of the context has been trying to keep a low profile and get better acquainted with the project, while doing research on the main contributors. He expects to make mistakes and asks for guidance in determining what needs QA work first. The author is available via various communication channels and promises not to be offended if he is being annoying or stepping on toes. Additionally, the author is working on an idiot proof solution for commit testing to get as many people testing as possible.
